definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: The irrevocable trend of the development of the Chinese characters is simplifying.
sentences.chinese: 简化是汉字发展不可逆转的走向。

sentences.english: But he said erosion of the U.S. manufacturing base 'is irreversible.
sentences.chinese: 但他说，美国制造业基础的侵蚀是不可逆转的。

sentences.english: The lightening and thinning of wool product is an irreversible tendency in wool spinning industry of today.
sentences.chinese: 羊毛产品轻薄化是当今毛纺行业不可逆转的趋势。

sentences.english: The internationalization of the food science and technology periodicals is irreversible.
sentences.chinese: 食品类科技期刊国际化是时代发展不可逆转的潮流。

sentences.english: Globalization has become an unalterable tendency and an unarguable fact.
sentences.chinese: 全球化已成为不可逆转的趋势和不可抗拒的客观事实。

sentences.english: Economic Globalization represents the irresistible tendency in the development of modern world economy.
sentences.chinese: 经济全球化是当前世界经济发展不可逆转的时代趋势。

sentences.english: Democratization of IR (DIR) is unreversed historic trend.
sentences.chinese: 国际关系民主化是不可逆转的历史潮流。

sentences.english: This trope gives China a certain air of inevitability.
sentences.chinese: 这种修辞给了中国一股不可逆转命运的气息。

sentences.english: Usually early symptomless , when the symptom presents the eye to be blind, irreversible.
sentences.chinese: 通常早期无症状，等到症状出现眼睛已瞎，不可逆转。

sentences.english: The toe bones, which are still developing, develop an irreversible deformity.
sentences.chinese: 使得仍然正在生长中的脚趾骨产生不可逆转的变形。

sentences.english: By utilizing the irreversibility of the rotation of the ratchet, the cargo can be tied up.
sentences.chinese: 利用棘轮旋转的不可逆转性即可把货物捆牢。

sentences.english: After age two, the negative effects of undernutrition are largely irreversible.
sentences.chinese: 两岁以后，营养不良造成的副作用将是不可逆转的了。

sentences.english: Currently, the freeness of trade and investment has been an inreverasal trend.
sentences.chinese: 目前，贸易和投资自由化已成为不可逆转的国际潮流。

sentences.english: The trend of détente cannot be reversed.
Economic globalization is the irreversible trend in the present world economic development.
sentences.chinese: 经济全球化是当前世界经济发展不可逆转的时代趋势。

sentences.english: First, the historical trend of China-US cooperation is irreversible.
sentences.chinese: 首先，中美合作的历史趋势不可逆转。

definition: to decline/to fall/to drop/to falter/a decline/recession (in economics)
more critical with every passing day
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
